# MAPSCE

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of MAPSCE is to allow users for quick mapping of subclonal events on the tumour evolutionary trees. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of demopckg from [GitHub](https://github.com) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("MarkTranHS/MAPSCE")
```
